typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year,
		title),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
AggregateComedyRatings, MoviesDB join(AggregateComedyRatings@title == MoviesDB@title
	&& AggregateComedyRatings@year == MoviesDB@year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		genres,
		title = AggregateComedyRatings@title,
		year = AggregateComedyRatings@year,
		Rating,
		AverageComedyRating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AggregateComedyRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[("{currentDate()} .txt"
)],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> Sink
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[("JoinResult_{currentDate()}.txt")],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
